p: HCoV-229E (subgenus Duvinacovirus) and HCoV-NL63 (subgenus Setracovirus) belong to the genus Alphacoronavirus. The four other coronaviruses belong to the genus Betacoronavirus. HCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HKU1 are subspecies of the species Betacoronavirus 1 in the subgenus Embecovirus. MERS-CoV is a member of the subgenus Merbecovirus and SARS-CoV of the subgenus Sarbecovirus ( Walker et al., 2019).
